text: "I Put a Spell on You" is a 1956 song by Screamin' Jay Hawkins. It has become a cult classic song and has been covered by various artists. It was Hawkins' greatest success single. It was ranked #313 on the Rolling Stone 500 Greatest Songs of All Time. ==References== Category:1956 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Nina Simone songs Category:Creedence Clearwater Revival songs Category:Bryan Ferry songs Category:Bonnie Tyler songs Category:Eels (band) songs Category:The Animals songs Category:Eric Burdon songs Category:Annie Lennox songs Category:Marilyn Manson songs Category:Van Morrison songs Category:Alan Price songs
title: I Put a Spell on You
